1.0.name: wordpress/silesia
1.0.description: Clean style and elegant theme based on HTML5 powered by NattyWP Framework and advanced Theme Options. You can adjust Colors (more than 15 options), display Twitter and Flickr feeds, Upload logo, Favicon, Backgrounds, etc. without editing code. Theme supported by http://www.nattywp.com
